Literature.Title: Antibacterial evaluation of structurally amphipathic, membrane active small cationic peptidomimetics: synthesized by incorporating 3-amino benzoic acid as peptidomimetic element.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=410 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 723(MIC=40µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2295(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 3160(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2763(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1720(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
